modName: Book of UUNP - WAFR and CCOR Patches
summary: Compatibility patches for the Book of UUNP for Weapons and Armor Fixed Remade and Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade
descriptionHtml:
These patches bring the armors from gamefever's amazing Book of UUNP mod inline with the vanilla armor stats and recipe changes from kryptopyr's amazing Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade and Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade.

Requires: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75861/?]The Book of UUNP[/url]
author: Whestone

files.name: The Book of UUNP - CCOR
files.changelogHtml:
New files thanks to idonthate you.
- Version number changes to mirror The Book of UUNP
- Updated for The Book of UUNP v1.67
- Where Weapons and Armor Remade has equipment with equal stats, I have tried to give the Book of UUNP analogues the same stats
- WAFR and Spike keywords added to equipment that didn't have them, using close analogues
- Where Book of UUNP uses the Steel Armor variant that has pauldrons for male models, I have changed the stats to those from Steel Armor with Pauldrons in WAFR
- Readded Book of UUNP recipe books as a requirement for Book of UUNP recipes for greater consistency with Book of UUNP
- Removed Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade conditions from modified Book of UUNP recipes that were exclusive with the recipes CCOR added
- Changed recipes to be consistent with equipment with equal stats and equivalent models, except cases where CCOR distinguishes between the recipes
- Book of UUNP recipes will use the "immersive" recipe analogue from CCOR, and always be available in that form regardless of which complexity setting you choose in CCOR

files.name: The Book of UUNP - WAFR

New files thanks to idonthate you.
- Version number changes to mirror The Book of UUNP
- Updated for The Book of UUNP v1.67
- Where Weapons and Armor Remade has equipment with equal stats, I have tried to give the Book of UUNP analogues the same stats
- WAFR and Spike keywords added to equipment that didn't have them, using close analogues
- Where Book of UUNP uses the Steel Armor variant that has pauldrons for male models, I have changed the stats to those from Steel Armor with Pauldrons in WAFR
- Readded Book of UUNP recipe books as a requirement for Book of UUNP recipes for greater consistency with Book of UUNP
- Removed Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade conditions from modified Book of UUNP recipes that were exclusive with the recipes CCOR added
- Changed recipes to be consistent with equipment with equal stats and equivalent models, except cases where CCOR distinguishes between the recipes
- Book of UUNP recipes will use the "immersive" recipe analogue from CCOR, and always be available in that form regardless of which complexity setting you choose in CCOR
